body:
this MC is a chad.  First of all; you forget.  He was insulted, bullied, treated like wasted space.  Yet; his hard work ethics never got him no women, just their pity to make themselves feel morally righteous.  He discovered the cheating between the blonde and president of the club.  He then addressed it with the presidents unsatified gf main actress.  His dick won.  Not only was his dick beyond Supersayan lv4 blue goku, that shit went into ultra instinct fucking 4 girls infront of the whole club as they all got NTR cucked in their faces.

They called him a loser; but they all went back for a dose of dick dophamine he provied with ease.

He fell in love with the new girl.  But he was too SLOW.  All he had to do was go into the room. Not stall.
Then the newbie would of had ZERO chance.

He didn't get cucked either by the final girl.  They had no confession to each other. He was too late.  That is all.
He realized; the first girl. He won via her cheating president was the one; too late.

It actually makes a lot of sense when going back to re-read some parts: he can ONLY get girls through manipulation and cannot man up and confess to someone he likes. I also agree with @Bob Lee that it's likely the MC will get the blonde and Hinako back, but they'll be little more than sex mates.

This doujins lesson is this, he can't steal the one he loves because he truly LOVE her TRUE being. Conclusion - NTR cucks will never find their true happiness. Wholesome is the way. Hentai may be fiction but they can still influence people. So be aware.

Seem like an open ending. To me, I think that the MC ended up with the Blond and the short hair girl only, which seem to be the highest possibility. The blond is just as much of a loser like the MC, so of course it make sense that they'll end up together. The first girl, the short hair one, is already in love with the MC after part 2 and only obey to him now. Even though she a slut, she still listen to the MC. The rest of the girls though seem like they moved on.
2/5 girls, not bad I guess. Still, I rate this manga 7/10.

I mean, if i get a girl to leave her boyfriend for me, who says that she will not do the same to me?
A woman who becomes unfaithful once, will repeat the same time and time again. 
Even if I liked her a lot I would still have trust issues with her.

Actually, I kind of like how he says that he can actually recover the girl that he wants by breaking her.
The problem is, what he liked about the last girl was that she was "pure".
If he gets her by trickery, then he will have another broken companion. If he doesn't, then he loses her forever but she remains pure (in the arms of another man, but still pure)
As for the other girls, they were treated as expendable, so naturally they moved on. He can also recover them, but he doesn't want to. Because he really doesn't want them. Even the first girl, she is not the girl he liked anymore.

The ending is him realizing that for all his belief that he can get whatever woman he wants, at the end of the day he's basically just a deviant who's only good at manipulating, blackmailing, or forcing women in to becoming as depraved as he is. He's unable to confess to the girl he likes, winds up jacking off to the sight of her having sex with his junior, and when he tries to kid himself in to thinking that Hinako likes him, he realizes that no, all he's done is make her a sex-crazed deviant who's now pulling the same schemes that he is. At the end of the day, and for everything he's managed to accomplish, he's still ultimately just a loser who can't man up enough to confess to the girls he likes and happily jacks off to the sight of them having sex with other people.
